title: WTS/WTT T200 Fatima Phil AL - Phil NL - Brooklyn - Cincinnati
author: sagard

posts.post_title: WTS/WTT T200 Fatima Phil AL - Phil NL - Brooklyn - Cincinnati
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell or trade several T200 Fatima:

1913 T200 Fatima Philadelphia A's Americans SGC 3 World Champs - $500
1913 T200 Fatima Philadelphia Nationals SGC 4 - $900
1913 T200 Fatima Cincinnati SGC 3 - $500
1913 T200 Fatima Brooklyn Dodgers SGC 3 - $900

Comps are tough to find so I'm certainly willing to listen to all offers.  The SGC created scans are going to be in the replies.  Will take PayPal GS and gladly can "coin" if we are close to a deal.

For trades I'd love to hear all offers!  1941 Playball through the 60s.  Of course I'd listen to earlier tobacco cards, but I know they are hard to get.

[quote name="Brownie33" post=2371538]Very sharp cards![/QUOTE]

Thanks the SGC provided scans are so good.   I’ve never been able to do them justice at home scanning.
